Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2008 01:12PM KTgirl wrote: Estepp, My dear, how in the heck did you come up with the 53% survival stat?  You can not be "staged" (Stages 1 thru 4 with various steps in between), until you have had your surgery!  Silly lady!  :) During the surgery, they will take out some of your lymph nodes and test them to see if there are any cancer cells in them.  If there are not, you're going to be classified as a Stage 1 with a 95% survival rate!  and if there are some cells in the lymph nodes, you can still be completely cured, and I believe the survival rate is around 85%! So take that 53% and throw it out of the window my dear.  (P.S.  You too, will soon become an expert on this subject!....we all are!!).  Have a good weekend.  All is well!
Posts.Title: Didn't have it in me Estepp CathyaMom

Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2008 03:59PM KTgirl wrote: I'm really sorry to hear that your biopsies hurt so much!  I am so puzzled when I read about the pain that some women describe, because I have had several biopsies and they didn't hurt at all.  I really never felt a thing. Anyway, I am at work and can't write as much as I would like, but I just want you to know that I am a 1 year Survivor and doing JUST GREAT.  They have such great treatment these days. This is the scariest part of the whole process.  You will get past this! You will be FINE!! Love from Sacramento, CA
Posts.Title: Didn't have it in me Estepp CathyaMom

Posts.Content: Jun 26, 2008 08:07PM KTgirl wrote: Just wanted to let you know about a wonderful, free, website called CAREPAGES.COM.  It is a blog that you can create online that allows you to give updates to your friends, family, and supporters.  In turn, they can leave you wonderful messages of support that will help you get thru your experience.  You can also post pictures.  This webpage helped me so much as I went thru my treatment, and I really think it will help you, too.  Just log on to CAREPAGES.COM and "Create" a carepage for yourself by following the easy step-by-step instructions.  If you'd like to check out the carepage that I created for myself, you can "visit" my Carepage by entering "KatieGill2007."  I will check in with you frequently!  Take Care and try not to worry too much.  Katie
Posts.Title: Didn't have it in me Estepp CathyaMom
